documentation.text:
@dev Remove tokens from staking and transfer them to the caller.
 @param _token Address of the token to unstake.

@dev Add a token to the list of allowed tokens.
 @param _token The token to add.
@dev Give out DAPP tokens based on the amount of staked tokens to all users.

addAllowedToken(address).details: Add a token to the list of allowed tokens.

getTokenValue(address).details: Get the USD value of a token.

returns._0: The USD value of a token and the number of decimals the USD value has.

getUserSingleTokenValue(address,address).details: Get the value in USD of a token staked by a user.

returns._0: The value in USD of a token staked by a user.

getUserTotalValue(address).details: Get the total in USD of tokens staked by a user.

returns._0: The total in USD of tokens staked by a user.

issueTokens().details: Give out DAPP tokens based on the amount of staked tokens to all users.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setPriceFeedContract(address,address).details: Set a price feed address for a token.

params._priceFeed: The address of the price feed.

stakeTokens(uint256,address).details: Add tokens to stake in this contract.

params._token: Address of the token to stake.

tokenIsAllowed(address).details: Checks whether a token is allowed to be staked.

returns._0: Whether the token is allowed to be staked.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unstakeTokens(address).details: Remove tokens from staking and transfer them to the caller.

params._token: Address of the token to unstake.
